object_name: Tankard with the arms of Lord Trevor impaling Weldon
text: Lord Thomas Trevor served in various official capacities during his career.  The large dinner service to which this belongs appears to refer to the marriage of Trevor to his cousin Anne Weldon, who became his second wife in 1700.
title: Tankard with the arms of Lord Trevor impaling Weldon
